body_content.explanation: a piece of meat from the stomach or soft lower part of a pig's body:
examples: We shared crispy pork belly with noodles.
One of the highlights of the evening was the roast pork belly.

body_content.explanation: meat from the stomach or soft lower part of a pig's body, bought and sold on futures agreements (= in which the price is agreed before a particular future time at which the goods will be provided):
examples: Carbon could become a new agricultural commodity, traded like corn and pork bellies.
He was fascinated by the stock market, cattle futures, and pork bellies.
